column4: Yeah my head's a mess,, cause you got me
column6: We're giants in a little man's world
column7: My heart is pumping up so big that it could burst
column10: I'm trying so hard not to let it show
column11: But you got me feeling like
column12: I'm stepping on buildings,, cars,, and boats
column13: I swear I could touch the sky
column20: Be careful,, so don't be afraid
column21: Your safe here,, no these arms won't let you break
column22: I put up a sign in the clouds
column23: They all know that we ain't ever coming down
column31: Make me what I never was
